医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 大流行如何改变了常见细菌感染的抗生素处方研究人员评估了 2019 年冠状病毒大流行对普通感染初级保健中抗生素使用的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-altered-antibiotic-prescribing-for-common-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-altered-antibiotic-prescribing-for-common-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abfcbc8c-be8e-4405-93eb-d30048b381b0 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 05:45:00 -0400 How the COVID-19 pandemic altered antibiotic prescribing for common bacterial infections
低细菌饮食可以改善中性粒细胞减少癌症患者的预后吗？科学家们回顾了现有文献，以提供低细菌饮食对中性粒细胞减少癌症患者有效性的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Can-a-low-bacterial-diet-improve-outcomes-for-neutropenic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Can-a-low-bacterial-diet-improve-outcomes-for-neutropenic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bb4a38c-96d3-4727-983e-9abb28f2e884 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 03:57:00 -0400 Can a low-bacterial diet improve outcomes for neutropenic cancer patients?
研究探讨了摄入咖啡因对头痛的有效性：触发因素还是补救措施？咖啡因在头痛中具有双重作用，因为它可以诱发或缓解头痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-explores-the-effectness-of-caffeine-conspiration-for-headaches-trigger-or-remedy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Study-explores-the-effectness-of-caffeine-conspiration-for-headaches-trigger-or-remedy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=151c1a74-e5df-4722-a820-500aff6f9666 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 03:53:00 -0400 Study explores the effectiveness of caffeine consumption for headaches: trigger or remedy?
促炎细胞因子水平及其与先兆子痫严重程度的关系研究人员检查了先兆子痫孕妇的血浆白细胞介素 6、血管细胞粘附分子 1 和 C 反应蛋白水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Pro-itis-cytokine-levels-and-their-relation-to-preeclampsia-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Pro-lingual-cytokine-levels-and-their-relation-to-preeclampsia-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=024333fb-c22e-4268-a880-fac3c52a2e48 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 03:49:00 -0400 Pro-inflammatory cytokine levels and their relation to preeclampsia severity
认知刺激活动可降低老年人患痴呆症的风险研究人员调查了老年人的社交网络、休闲活动和痴呆风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Cognitively-stimulate-activities-reduce-dementia-risk-in-the-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Cognitively-stimulate-activities-reduce-dementia-risk-in-the-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec425737-4daf-4787-8ee5-2f899986ce8e Thu, 20 Jul 2023 03:40:00 -0400 Cognitively stimulating activities reduce dementia risk in the elderly
全球研究的见解：饮食模式、心血管疾病和死亡之间的关联研究人员利用前瞻性城乡流行病学研究数据，制定了与全球适用的健康结果相关的健康饮食评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Insights-from-a-global-study-The-association- Between-dietary-patterns-cardioangio-diseases-and-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230720/Insights-from-a-global-study-The-association- Between-dietary-patterns-cardioangio-diseases-and-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db83e437-7dd1-4a90-9f6c-0b346e2f3258 Thu, 20 Jul 2023 03:31:00 -0400 Insights from a global study: The association between dietary patterns, cardiovascular diseases, and deaths
研究表明 T 细胞可用于识别 1 型糖尿病风险斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家表明，分析血液中某种类型的免疫细胞可以帮助识别有患 1 型糖尿病风险的人，1 型糖尿病是一种危及生命的自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/T-cells-can-be-used-to-identify-type-1-diabetes-risk-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/T-cells-can-be-used-to-identify-type-1-diabetes-risk-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a9a205-6b2b-4bd0-894a-11aa64789a98 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 23:50:42 -0400 T cells can be used to identify type 1 diabetes risk, study shows
蛋白质 CEACAM1 和 TIM-3 可能有助于保护肝移植一项新的研究确定了免疫系统中的某些蛋白质如何相互作用导致器官排斥。这项研究涉及小鼠和人类患者的实验，发现了 CEACAM1 (CC1) 和 TIM-3 两种分子之间的重要通讯途径，发现该途径在肝移植过程中控制人体免疫反应中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Proteins-CEACAM1-and-TIM-3-may-help-protect-liver-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Proteins-CEACAM1-and-TIM-3-may-help-protect-liver-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d63e6bfc-6508-4986-9f89-a50b51fb6aea Wed, 19 Jul 2023 23:44:00 -0400 Proteins CEACAM1 and TIM-3 may help protect liver transplants
COVID-19 期间的医疗保健中断与可预防的住院风险增加有关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，在 covid-19 大流行期间经历过医疗服务（包括预约和手术）中断的人更有可能入院治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Healthcare-disruption-during-COVID-19-linked-to-increased-risk-of-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Healthcare-disruption-during-COVID-19-linked-to-increased-risk-of-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa62b5dd-9d46-4184-9b8a-250c203c9d52 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 23:11:00 -0400 Healthcare disruption during COVID-19 linked to increased risk of preventable hospitalizations
胎儿接触癫痫药物不会影响儿童的神经发育大多数在怀孕期间服用处方抗癫痫药物的母亲可以松一口气：《柳叶刀神经病学》今天发表的一项新研究发现，在子宫内接触常用处方药物的幼儿的神经发育结果并不比健康妇女的孩子更差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Fetal-exposure-to-epilepsy-medications-does-not-affect-neurodevelopment-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Fetal-exposure-to-epilepsy-medications-does-not-affect-neurodevelopment-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bfeccf2-7e70-425b-9f13-d99003e79a2a Wed, 19 Jul 2023 23:05:22 -0400 Fetal exposure to epilepsy medications does not affect neurodevelopment in children
